name: Crypt Mayhem
description:
Cassie is a young girl who is taking care of her little brother when an evil witch kidnaps him and pulles him down the ancient crypt under the city of Salem. Cassie must save her brother before it's too late!

In every chamber of the crypt she'll have to find one piece of paper with important information about the witch's past. Once she have found all the pieces she'll be able to defeat the witch.
